original_text: All the heave offerings of the holy things, which the children of Israel offer unto the Lord, have I given thee, and thy sons and thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: it is a covenant of salt for ever before the Lord unto thee and to thy seed with thee.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께 거제로 드리는 모든 성물은 내가 영구한 몫의 음식으로 너와 네 자녀에게 주노니 이는 여호와 앞에 너와 네 후손에게 영원한 소금 언약이니라

sentences.original_text: All the heave offerings of the holy things
which the children of Israel offer unto the Lord
and thy sons and thy daughters with thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너와 함께 네 아들들과 네 딸들에게도

sentences.original_text: it is a covenant of salt for ever
and to thy seed with thee
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 함께 네 자손을 위한 것이니라
